rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance space with minimal Bohemian accents and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living space integrated with the kitchen, designed in a Bohemian style featuring eclectic decor and comfortable seating arrangements. Vastu principles ensure optimal energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area with ample counter space, modern appliances and an outdoor grill area for casual dining; designed to foster social interaction while maintaining functionality.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet, cozy library zone dedicated to reading and study. It incorporates natural elements like wooden shelves and ambient lighting in line with Vastu principles for knowledge growth.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: A Bohemian-inspired bedroom with personalized decor, comfortable bed arrangement, and ample storage. The room is designed following Vastu guidelines to enhance positive energy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom integrated within the ground floor plan with necessary fixtures, ensuring privacy and convenience. Vastu recommendations are followed for water-related aspects.
